content.title: Thanks to the first bakers! I will work hard to achieve our goal!
content.creator:
SLUNAZ - Stefano Lunazzi
March 15, 2025
content.content:
Hello guys!
Thanks to the first bakers! 
We still have a long way to go to reach my dream: saving the planet by eliminating single-use plastic in 3D printing! 
Let's spread the word! 
Let's turn all plastic bottles into new reels for your 3D printing
Pleace to meet you, I'm Stefano!

comments.text: Good luck! After Sunlaz FF1R, I sincerely hope that this new crowdfunding campaign works so that we can finally have something to really recycle! Well done for your work!
